title: Federated Learning-Based Project for Improving Tactile Perception Differentiation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic grasp of tactile perception and possession of learning motivation
context.additional_context: Practice-centered training for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields using personal devices (BYOD)

learning_goals: Learners can improve fine tactile discrimination ability by over 30% through associative learning of linguistic stimuli and tactile patterns
Learners can comparatively analyze the effects of linguistic labeling and non-linguistic (musical) stimuli on tactile perception
Learners can comprehensively evaluate tactile-auditory associative learning outcomes through visual reports and presentations after project implementation
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
